form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, I-131

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. OMB No Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FEE STAMP OCT 91981 OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES 10/12/81 as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Immigration and Nationality Act Naturalizeri Service New York N.Y. Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt SiTLANi, NARAiNDAS T. Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above. C/O IN CARE OF If you checked "Extension" you must submit the reentry per- mit you wish to have extended. (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) MAILING ADDRESS (City) 35 North Way (State) ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER (ZIP Code) IN U.S. Chappaqua, 10514 A- 34-733-884 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLYIF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 8.30.07 Pakistan India Black Gray/white HEIGHT 5 FEET o INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS Mole on forehead 3. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS Naraindas Tolaram Sitlani GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED Seattle 4/13/75 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL Naraindas Tolaram Sitlani N.Y. NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: Pan Am 2/24/81 5. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD N.Y. 12/81 About a year NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL Pan Am. 6. FILL IN ITEM 6 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO RENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY AST PERMIT 4/24/80 (City and State) IS ATTACHED NYC IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED. STATE EXPIRATION DATE 4/23/81 ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 7 THROUGH 16, INCLUSIVE 7. PRESENT OCCUPATION: Retired NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 567-35-0326 8. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) 9. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and completely Industrial Assr. Bldg., 2nd Floor, Flat B2, Churchgate, Bombay-20 India Visit family RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM 1.131 (Rev. 10-25-79)N OVER 10/29/81
